description: Timing argument: June 4th proclamation (2 days after HK claim) made Harvard-CCP ties NS since April 7th
importance_note: Estimated contextual importance - not from CatBoost analysis (case-specific fact, not generalizable feature)
chroma_query_template: April 7 June 4 proclamation timing national security since {case_context}

recommendations.critical: Include the timing argument connecting April 7th, HK claim filing, and June 4th proclamation.
recommendations.rationale: This establishes that Harvard's ties to Xi Jinping's daughter became a recognized matter of national security since April 7th, when Plaintiff first wrote Harvard, because the June 4th proclamation came into effect 2 days after the HK claim was filed.
recommendations.example: The June 4th proclamation came into effect 2 days after Plaintiff filed the Hong Kong claim in this court, making Harvard's ties to Xi Jinping's daughter a recognized matter of national security since the time Plaintiff first wrote Harvard on April 7th.
recommendations.insight: This timing argument is crucial for showing the national security issue was present from the beginning of the case, not just after the proclamation.

suggestions: Mention April 7th (when Plaintiff first wrote Harvard)
Connect them: proclamation came 2 days after HK claim filed
Explain this made it NS since April 7th
